瓃字的基本解释

瓃
léi
一种玉器。
一种玉。
古同“蕾”，含苞待放的花。

瓃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［léi］
［《廣韻》魯回切，平灰，來。］
［《廣韻》力追切，平脂，來。］
［《廣韻》力遂切，去至，來。］
(1)玉器。
(2)喻指美女。

瓃字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瓃； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页744第27
【唐韻】魯回切【集韻】【韻會】盧回切，?音雷。【說文】玉器也。【集韻】或作?。　又【廣韻】力追切【集韻】倫追切，?音㶟。義同。【集韻】或作?。　又【廣韻】力遂切【集韻】力僞切，?音累。義同。

瓃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瓃字的起名意思

一种玉器或玉；古同“蕾”，指含苞待放的花。

Hu
Basic explanation of words
Hu
léi
A kind of jade.
A kind of jade.
In ancient times, the "bud" is a flower in bud.
Hu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［léi］
["Guang Yun" Lu Hui cut, flat gray, come. ]
["Guang Yun" strives to pursue cutting, flat fat, come. ]
["Guangyun" cut forcefully, go to, come. ]
(1) Jade.
(2) Yu refers to beautiful women.
Hu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瓃; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 744 27
[Tang Yun] Lu Hui cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Lu Hui cut,? Yin Lei. [Said the text] Jade also. [Ji Yun] Or make?.　[Guangyun] force to chase [Jiyun] Lun to chase,? Yin 㶟. The same meaning. [Ji Yun] Or make?.　[Guangyun] force and cut [Jiyun] force pseudo cut, sound tired. The same meaning.

Name meaning
